mapper.insert: insert into cardlist(board_id, cardlist_name, cardlist_cards, cardlist_secret) values(#{board_id}, #{cardlist_name}, #{cardlist_cards}, #{cardlist_secret})
mapper.update: update cardlist set cardlist_name = #{cardlist_name}, cardlist_cards = #{cardlist_cards}, board_id = #{board_id}, cardlist_secret = #{cardlist_secret} where cardlist_id = #{cardlist_id}
mapper.select: select cl.* from board b, cardlist cl where cardlist_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') and b.board_id = cl.board_id and b.mem_id = #{mem_id}
